center-image.description: Centers an image horizontaly. If you need to center an image only on mobile clients, you can apply the .small-float-center class

button-foundation.description:
sizing classes -> tiny, small, large
'expanded' for full width of it's container
small-expanded for expand on small only
Radius -> radius, rounded
Also coloring classes can be used

center-button.description: Wrap the button with <center> tags to center it.

columns.description:
small="num" for mobile size of grid column (1 to 12)
large="num" for desktop size of grid column (1 to 12)
valign="top/middle/bottom" for vertical alignment

center-columns.description:
Centering columns can be done by adding empty columns to left and right of the column to be centered.
If you don't add a size attribute like small="x" then the columns will be equal width.

callout.description:
A Callout adds a border, background, and some padding
It uses a full table structure, with the class .callout on the outer <table> (for bottom margin) and the .callout-inner applied to the innermost <th>

small.description: By inserting a <small> element into a header Foundation will scale the header font size down for an inline element, allowing you to use this for subtitles or other secondary header text
